suite.name: Amazon Testes

test.name: Caso de teste 01 - Acesso ao menu "Eletrônicos"

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (134.0.6998.90) detected in PATH at C:\Users\Gutenberg\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python313\Scripts\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (135.0.7049.114); currently, chromedriver 135.0.7049.97 is recommended for chrome 135.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Element Screenshot
kw.doc: Captures a screenshot from the element identified by ``locator`` and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verificar se o título da página fica "Eletrônicos e Tecnologia | Amazon.com.br"
kw.source_name: Verificar se o título da página fica "${TEXTO}"

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.msg: Page title is 'Eletrônicos e Tecnologia | Amazon.com.br'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Verificar se aparece a frase "Eletrônicos e Tecnologia"
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Verificar se aparece a categoria "Computadores e Informática"
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Este teste verifica o menu Eletrônicos do side da amazon

test.name: Caso de teste 02 - Pesquisa de um Produto

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (134.0.6998.90) detected in PATH at C:\Users\Gutenberg\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python313\Scripts\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (135.0.7049.114); currently, chromedriver 135.0.7049.97 is recommended for chrome 135.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry

kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

Go To

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Digitar o nome de produto "Xbox Series S" no campo de pesquisa

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Xbox Series S' into text field '//input[@id='twotabsearchtextbox']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verificar o resultado da pesquisa se está listando o produto "Xbox Series S"

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Valida add produto e acessa carrinho
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.arg: Valida add produto e acessa carrinho
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Remover o produto "Xbox Series S" do carrinho
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Catenate
kw.msg: ${locator} = //span[(text()=' foi removido de Carrinho de compras. ')]//a[contains(text(), 'Xbox Series S')]
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element '//span[(text()=' foi removido de Carrinho de compras. ')]//a[contains(text(), 'Xbox Series S')]'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Verificar se o carrinho fica vazio
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Esse teste verifica a remoção de um produto no carrinho de compras

suite.doc: Esta suite teste o site da amazon
